com.nokia.midp.examples.JSR75.FileHandler
Class FileHandlerModelFileSystemListener

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.nokia.midp.examples.JSR75.FileHandler.FileHandlerModelFileSystemListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.io.file.FileSystemListener, java.lang.Runnable
class FileHandlerModelFileSystemListener
extends java.lang.Thread
implements javax.microedition.io.file.FileSystemListener

FileHandlerModelFileSystemListener is a thread class that is used for receiving status notification when adding or removing a file system root. This can be achieved by inserting or removing a card from a device or by mounting or unmounting file systems to a device.
